website_summaries.verdict: With its range of features, decent print quality, and fast print speeds, the Epson PictureMate Snap is a solid choice for snapshooters who want an at-home photo lab.
pros: allows for greater control over image settings
able to crop images on printer
can save images to external storage devices
cons: frames are limited mostly to Disney-themed ones

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate buy
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these I bought new, but needed to replace and bought this one second hand. The original one I had lasted quite a few years and I didn't have any regular problems with it till it stopped working. Felt I had gotten pretty good value for the original. This replacement was used and it didn't last at all, I am sorry I bought it used. I had to do maintenance and cleaning constantly and it used up all the ink before I could even print any photos, the value for dollar after buying the machine and the ink was very bad. Now i am giving up on it and feel like I was ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Pipeline

customer_reviews.title: IT IS EASY TO USE I HAD ONE MANY YEARS AGO GOT RID OF IT
customer_reviews.text: THE ONE I GOT LAST MONTH DID NOT WORK THE INK CARTAGE WAS IN THE PRINTERWHEN IT CAME AND COULD NOT GET IT TO PRINT THIS ONE PRINTS OUT GOOD PICTURES
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD GOUDY

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is not very technologically inclined and always complained when it came to printing pictures from our digital cameras. I basically had to do it for her as she had hard time pulling the photos from the cameras to print them out from our pc. SOLUTION! I bought her a picturemate snap and now she can print photos easily on her own with impressive results! This is a great portable printer! I would highly recommend it both for ease of use and print results.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rubalcava

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: It is so nice to be able to print your own photos in the convenience of your own home. This printer was rated best in a Money magazine survey so I purchased it. It is very easy to use and the pictures look very good. Anyone who purchases it should make sure to purchase the additional pack of paper and ink cartridge package because the printer does not come with much.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Cantey

customer_reviews.title: This was my second printer as my old one was ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my second printer as my old one was no longer working. Only problem with this one was the fact it needed a new printer pack immediately which seemed rather odd. They are expensive so I used the one I had in my old printer. I would expect it to come with a NEW printer pack.
customer_reviews.author: agnes ondrovic

customer_reviews.title: PictureMate Snap is a pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It is easy to use either stand alone or attached to a camera or PC. The results are of excellent quality and so convenient. No trip to the store or sending to a remote lab. The multiple formats and editing features round out the product. When I take a trip by car it will go with me for instant results.
customer_reviews.author: Polar Whiz

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to return Item as it did not function properly. Very poor picture quality may have been due to its age.
customer_reviews.author: Mike h

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Printer!
customer_reviews.text: Fast and fabulous photos - purchased the extra battery and now can take the printer downstairs or anywhere I want. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Saundra A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Printer was supposely tested. Does not recognize ink, ...
customer_reviews.text: Printer was supposely tested. Does not recognize ink, none of the buttons on the printer appears to work except the on/off button.
customer_reviews.author: Marverlan Jolivette

customer_reviews.title: Really nice item. Only thing that puts a frown on ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my cousin, but I played with it first so I could teach her how to use it. Really nice item. Only thing that puts a frown on my face is....a friend of mine saw the photo printer and went on Craigs List and bought an "almost new" one for $35. She showed it to me and it was hardly used. However, I like the one I bought that was "brand new".
customer_reviews.author: Janet Walker

customer_reviews.title: This printer full damaged.Packing not good i packed cartoon box only but printer is not iron plastic only.It is broken when open
customer_reviews.text: This printer full damaged.Packing not good i packed cartoon box only but printer is not iron plastic only.It is broken when opened.I should give you 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: wahengbam ingocha singh

customer_reviews.title: EPSON DID IT AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! I purchased this printer to replace my old Picturemate (the original) that died after 4 years of hard use. I really didn't expect to see a huge difference in quality, a Picturemate is a Picturemate right? WRONG! The print speed and quality are OUTSTANDING, even better than my old picturemate! I did shop around and after visiting a couple of well known electronic and office supply stores and hearing "Oh..if you had an Epson photo printer, you definitely won't be satisfied with any other brand" a handful of times, I came home and ordered this little jem. If you are in the market for a compact photo printer, this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: CylonFan

customer_reviews.title: Epson goes backwards!
customer_reviews.text: While technology usually improves while getting cheaper Epson manages to degrade their product line. Currently Amazon makes Epson's previous model available, and it costs less. The previous model, titled PictureMate Deluxe uses a more complex ink system and the prints last longer. The current unit makes decent prints, but sadly, they are inferior to the discontinued line. This is a great product, in all forms, but while Epson has been busy finding ways to cheapen their product, the competition is printing 5x7's. Why has Epson gone backwards?
customer_reviews.author: Damien Margo

customer_reviews.title: Epson does it best!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great little personal photo printer. Easy to operate right out of the box. Small enough to take with you to events such as weddings, family reunions, political protests, etc. or just to set up in a small corner of your desk for your photo printing needs. Prints are as good, if not better than what you'll get from a photo lab. I've now purchased one for most of the women in my extended family, and they all love them! Hurrah for PictureMate!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Richmond

customer_reviews.title: great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased Picture Mate and found it really easy to use (directions that actually make sense), compact in size, and produces great photos. Can be used with the computer or memory card. It is really accurate when producing multiple copies and is pretty speedy. Just make sure you purchase a picture mate print pack (cartridge and paper) because the one that comes with the printer only gives you enough for 11 or so photos.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I received this printer for Christmas and I was thinking, OH GREAT ANOTHER LOUSY PRINTER. Boy was I wrong. The pictures print out photo lab perfect and the ink and paper are reasonable as well. The printer isn't large and oversized so it is not a chore to take it with you to gatherings and functions. I recommend this printer to anyone who has pictures they would like to print on the spot.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blandford

customer_reviews.title: It does what I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these yesterday. The photos I printed from my 2GB SD card from my Canon G7 were of very good quality. The instructions to set up the printer were flawless and easy to understand. The printer works without the computer. We have an Epson CX6600 that we have not been able to get to print 4x6. This model 240 fills that need.
customer_reviews.author: TTQC Driver

customer_reviews.title: The proof is in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Normally dye based inks have less longevity then oil based pigments. The picturemate snap uses a reformulated dye based ink. It truly is water resistant. I know because I put a picture into a mayonaise jar with water and left it there. 2 weeks later that photo looked just like it had just come out of the printer. Try it for yourself. Also, as to the longevity claim, this has also been tested by willhelm-research.com, which is an independant testing facility. I own this printer and I absolutely love it. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a small, easy to use photo printer. To see the information follow this : [...]
customer_reviews.author: L. and R. Bolding

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: This printer will blow you away. You will be amazed at the quality of the pictures. I have a photo printer that is 3 times the price with the same quality. If you need a printer that easy, small, and prints great pictures, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Geary J. Plateroti

customer_reviews.title: Epson PictureMate Snap 4x6 Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: Epson PictureMate Snap 4x6 Photo Printer is a great little printer that produces very nice quality photos. It is easy to use and very easy to take with you when you are on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Robert 93940

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, good output, but deficient
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and produces good output but it has one fault that may be a deal killer for some. It does not recognize SD cards of over 1 GB. I thought it was DOA when it wouldn't recognize my SD card, so I called Tech Support. They said that that's just the way it is. This "feature" wasn't mentioned in any reviews or writeups. Who wants to limit themselves to 1 GB cards anymore? I won't return it because who knows what undocumented "features" the competition has - but I'm not real happy!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Stelmack

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away at the quality of prints produced by this printer. In a word: Perfect. If you are looking for a personal photo printer, this is definately the one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hellman

customer_reviews.title: epson snap
customer_reviews.text: just got epson snap works great its a no brainer real easy.got it for 45.00 recon at the epson site free ship . did i say it works great!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Marino

customer_reviews.title: PictureMate
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pictures. Good viewing. Lots of options. Incredibly slow to review pictures for printing. Very slow in just recognizing a memory card is installed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Callen

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with Epson photo printer
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought as a gift and I received rave reviews about the quality of the photos from my son.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Schladitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer!
customer_reviews.text: I recently used my PMSnap to create 3 scrapbooks for Mother's Day. It was so nice to have a printer with such bright and sharp pictures. And I loved the options with this printer. I could print wallets or index cards, with borders or zoom in. It was wonderful to be able to have your own photo lab in your own home.
customer_reviews.author: Tara L. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: I love my picturemate snap!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Epson picturemate snap for Christmas and I love it. t is easy to use and the picture quality is very good. It takes less than 30 seconds to print a photo from a memory card. If your looking for a good easy to use photo printer then I would recommend the picturemate snap.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, not so good software or sheet feeder
customer_reviews.text: Was truly impressed by the quality of the pictures. Was less impresed by the software in the printer to manage pictures and print - a bit confusing and slow. The ultimate disappointment was seeing how at times the paper gets jammed, which makes you lose precious ink and paper... Altogether I don't think I would recommend it...
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Single-purpose machine good for 1st-time parents
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and daughter-in-law who are snap-happy (of course!) with their first baby. This printer does a better job producing prints for scrap-booking and card-making than their general-purpose ink-jet printer.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy of three

customer_reviews.title: Photo Printer Review
customer_reviews.text: Great product is very easy to set up and use. I purchased it as a gift for my mother and after setting it up for her and using it I will purchase one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Preston I. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The Epson PictureMate is easy to use and the colors are the best!! Many options for editing the pictures before printing. Would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyne

product_meta.title: Epson PictureMate Snap (PM 240) 4x6 Photo Printer
product_meta.description:
Epson PictureMate Snap 4x6 Photo Printer

AMAZON.COM
Amazon.com PictureMate Snap personal photo lab gives you the power to print pro quality photos at home or on the go. Print your photos, your way and get beautiful prints with rich color, sharp detail and true-to-life skin tones.

 



Print your photos, your way with the PictureMate Snap. It's fun, easy-to-use features, and best of all it's PC-free. View larger. 

Use the adjustable, 2.5-inch, premium photo viewer to select and edit images from memory cards, digital cameras, and mobile phones. View larger. 

It's compact size and handle makes it a Snap to take this PictureMate with you on your next trip or family reunion. View larger. Use the adjustable, 2.5-inch, premium photo viewer to select and edit images from memory cards, digital cameras and mobile phones. You can even crop your photos or remove red eye, without using a computer. Then, print pro quality, 4x6 photos in up to 45 seconds1, all with just one touch. PictureMate Snap is the fast, convenient way to print all your favorite photos yourself. And, it has so many great features, it couldn’t be easier to get stacks of photos you’ll be proud to share. Add fun Disney frames or print wallets and jumbo wallets, portrait packages and more. It’s your choice! And, you don’t need a computer to do it. Print photos on the spot--at the soccer game or family get together. The optional rechargeable battery makes it easy.

 Best of all, prints from PictureMate Snap will last generations, and longer than traditional, film-processed photos. Each print is smudge, scratch, water and fade resistant for convenient, worry free handling. 

 Each PictureMate Print Pack contains everything you need to print beautiful photos. There are even matte and glossy photo paper options! It’s never been easier to print amazing photos--all at an everyday, low print price. So, trust your memories to PictureMate Snap. It’s the anytime, anywhere, photo printer that anyone can use. 

 

Features and Benefits 

 Pro quality, 4x6 photos you can print yourself


 * Print amazing photos with rich color, sharp detail and true-to-life skin tones 
 * Print your photos, your way--no computer required 
 * Print a photo in as fast as 45 seconds1--all with just one touch 

Fun, easy-to-use features--PC-free
 * Insert any popular memory card, then view and edit your photos using the adjustable, 2.5-inch, premium photo viewer 
 * Crop your photos or remove red eye before printing--hassle-free 
 * Print true BorderFree classic borders, wallets, Disney frames, portrait packages, proof sheet and much more 
 * Use PictureMate Snap virtually anywhere--travel friendly design and optional rechargeable battery make it easy 

Long-lasting results
 * Print photos that last generations, and longer than traditional, film-processed photos 
 * Share photos so durable, they’re smudge, scratch, water and fade resistant for worry-free handling 

Affordable, convenient home printing
 * Print stacks of beautiful photos at an everyday, low print price--satisfaction guaranteed 
 * Pick up a Print Pack and get everything you need for beautiful, 4x6 photos (Each pack includes both a photo cartridge and photo paper.) 

Complete compatibility
 * Print directly from your memory card, digital camera or mobile phone 
 * Save photos to external CD-R/RW drives 
 * Use PictureMate Snap with or without your PC or Macintosh 

1. Color photo without a PC in border layout, measured from start of paper feed. Additional print time will vary based on system configuration, software application and page complexity. See www.epson.com/printspeed for more information about print speed.  What's in the box
PictureMate Snap printer, power cord, ink cartridge, and software
feature_bullets: Print a brilliant 4x6 photo in as fast as 45 seconds* with vibrant color and amazing detail.
With a 2.5" LCD, easily crop and enhance photos, remove red eye and much more -- no computer needed!
Beautiful glossy or matte prints last generations longer than traditional film-processed photos.
Enjoy smudge, scratch, water and fade resistant prints you'll be proud to share.
Print stacks of lab quality photos at an everyday low price -- it's an unbeatable value for superior photos

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars53 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
